info.name: üè• Smart Clinic Platform - Complete API Collection
info.description:
# üè• Smart Clinic Platform - Comprehensive Healthcare Management System

This is the complete API collection for the Smart Clinic platform, a comprehensive healthcare management system designed to streamline patient care, doctor scheduling, and clinic administration.

## üöÄ Core System Features

### 1. **Multi-Role User System**
- **Patient**: Book appointments, view medical profile, update personal information
- **Doctor**: Manage schedule, view appointments, access patient profiles  
- **Admin**: Full system management permissions

### 2. **Enhanced Doctor Management**
- **Specializations**: Cardiology, Dermatology, Neurology, Orthopedics, Pediatrics, Psychiatry, General, Dental, Eye, Surgery
- **Dual Schedule System**: Recurring weekly schedules + specific date schedules
- **Professional Data**: License number, experience, consultation fees
- **Schedule CRUD**: Complete create, read, update, delete operations

### 3. **Smart Appointment System**
- **Intelligent Booking**: Validates against both recurring and specific date schedules
- **Conflict Prevention**: Prevents double booking and scheduling conflicts
- **Patient-Specific Views**: Dedicated endpoints for patient appointment management
- **Status Management**: Comprehensive appointment lifecycle tracking

### 4. **Enhanced Clinic Management**
- **Clinic Details**: Complete clinic information with associated doctors
- **Doctor Integration**: Get all doctors working in specific clinics
- **Public Access**: Core clinic information available without authentication
- **Admin Controls**: Full clinic management for administrators

### 5. **Robust Authentication & Security**
- **JWT Authentication**: Access and refresh token system
- **Role-Based Permissions**: Granular access control by user type
- **Data Protection**: Users can only access their own data (with exceptions for doctors/admins)
- **Secure Endpoints**: All sensitive operations require proper authentication

## üåê Environment Configuration

### Production Environment
- **Base URL**: `https://smart-clinic-api.fly.dev/api/`
- **Status**: Live and ready for production use
- **Features**: Full feature set with production security

### Development Environment  
- **Base URL**: `http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/`
- **Status**: Local development server
- **Features**: Debug endpoints enabled

## üìã Complete API Endpoints

### üîê Authentication System
- `POST /auth/register/` - User registration with role selection
- `POST /auth/login/` - JWT token authentication
- `POST /auth/token/refresh/` - Token renewal
- `GET /users/me/` - Current user profile
- `PUT /users/update-profile/` - Profile updates
- `POST /users/upload-profile-image/` - Profile image upload

### üë®‚Äç‚öïÔ∏è Doctor Management
- `GET /doctors/` - List all doctors with filtering
- `GET /doctors/{id}/` - Detailed doctor information
- `GET /doctors/available/` - Available doctors with date/time filtering
- `GET /doctors/{doctor_id}/schedules/` - Doctor schedule overview

### üìÖ Enhanced Schedule Management
- `POST /doctors/schedule/create/` - Create recurring or specific date schedules
- `PUT /doctors/schedule/{schedule_id}/` - Update existing schedules
- `DELETE /doctors/schedule/{id}/delete/` - **NEW**: Delete schedules with safety checks

### üßë‚Äçü¶± Patient Management
- `GET /patients/me/` - Patient's own profile
- `GET /patients/{id}/` - Specific patient details (doctors/admin only)
- `GET /patients/{patient_id}/appointments/` - **NEW**: Patient-specific appointments

### üìù Smart Appointment System
- `GET /appointments/` - User-filtered appointment list
- `POST /appointments/create/` - Smart appointment booking with validation
- `GET /appointments/{id}/` - Detailed appointment information
- `PUT /appointments/{id}/` - Appointment status updates

### üè• Enhanced Clinic Management
- `GET /clinics/` - Public clinic directory
- `GET /clinics/{id}/` - **NEW**: Clinic details with doctor list
- `GET /clinics/{clinic_id}/doctors/` - **NEW**: Doctors in specific clinic
- `POST /clinics/create/` - Public clinic creation

### üëë Administrative Controls
- `GET /admin/users/` - Complete user management
- `GET /admin/clinics/` - Full clinic administration
- `POST /admin/clinics/` - Administrative clinic creation

### üîß Development Tools
- `GET /debug/users/` - User debugging information
- `POST /debug/cleanup-orphaned/` - Clean orphaned user records
- `GET /media/{file_path}` - Media file serving

## üÜï Latest Enhancements

### ‚ú® Enhanced Schedule System
- **Dual Schedule Types**: Support for both recurring weekly and specific date schedules
- **Smart Validation**: Specific dates override recurring schedules for appointments
- **Safety Checks**: Prevent deletion of schedules with existing appointments

### ‚ú® Clinic-Doctor Integration
- **Complete Clinic Views**: Get clinic information with all associated doctors
- **Doctor Filtering**: View only doctors working in specific clinics
- **Relationship Management**: Proper handling of clinic-doctor associations

### ‚ú® Patient-Centric Features
- **Dedicated Endpoints**: Patient-specific appointment views
- **Enhanced Privacy**: Improved data access controls
- **Better UX**: Streamlined patient experience

## üß™ Testing Guidelines

### Authentication Testing
1. Register users with different roles (patient, doctor, admin)
2. Test login and token refresh functionality
3. Verify JWT tokens are properly set in environment variables

### Permission Testing
1. Test role-based access restrictions
2. Verify patients can only access their own data
3. Confirm doctors can access patient profiles
4. Validate admin has full system access

### Feature Testing
1. Test both recurring and specific date schedule creation
2. Verify appointment booking against different schedule types
3. Test clinic-doctor relationship endpoints
4. Validate schedule deletion safety checks

### Error Handling
1. Test invalid authentication scenarios
2. Verify proper error messages for validation failures
3. Test edge cases and boundary conditions

## üîë Environment Variables

The collection uses these environment variables for dynamic testing:
- `base_url` - API base URL (production or development)
- `access_token` - JWT access token for authentication
- `refresh_token` - JWT refresh token
- `user_id`, `doctor_id`, `patient_id` - User identifiers
- `appointment_id`, `clinic_id`, `schedule_id` - Resource identifiers

## üåç Production Deployment

**Live API**: https://smart-clinic-api.fly.dev/api/

- ‚úÖ Production-ready security settings
- ‚úÖ PostgreSQL database
- ‚úÖ Media file handling
- ‚úÖ CORS configuration for frontend integration
- ‚úÖ Environment-based configuration

## üìû Support & Documentation

For technical support, feature requests, or bug reports:
- Review the API documentation within each endpoint
- Check the comprehensive test examples
- Verify environment variable configuration
- Test with different user roles for complete coverage

## üîÑ Version Information

**Collection Version**: v2.0 - Complete Feature Set
**API Version**: Latest with all enhancements
**Last Updated**: August 2025

---

**Ready to use with both development and production environments!**

item.name: üìÖ Enhanced Schedule Management
item.description: Complete schedule CRUD operations with support for recurring and specific date schedules

request.description: Retrieve all schedules for a specific doctor, including both recurring weekly schedules and specific date schedules.

exec: console.log('Recurring schedule created with ID:', response.id);

request.description: Create a recurring weekly schedule that repeats every week on the specified day. Valid days: Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday, Sunday.

exec: console.log('Specific date schedule created with ID:', response.id);

request.description: Create a schedule for a specific date that overrides any recurring schedule. Perfect for holidays, special events, or one-time schedule changes.
Update an existing schedule. Can modify times, availability status, and notes.
üÜï Delete a doctor's schedule with safety checks. Prevents deletion if there are existing appointments scheduled during this time.

item.name: üßë‚Äçü¶± Patient Management
item.description: Patient profile access and medical information management

request.description: Get the authenticated patient's own profile including medical history, allergies, and emergency contact information.
Access specific patient information. Restricted to doctors and administrators for medical purposes.

item.name: üìù Smart Appointment System
item.description: Enhanced appointment management with intelligent scheduling and validation

request.description: Get appointments filtered by user role - patients see their own appointments, doctors see their scheduled appointments.
üÜï Get appointments for a specific patient. Patients can only access their own appointments, doctors/admins can access any patient's appointments.

exec: // Save appointment ID for subsequent operations
console.log('Appointment created successfully with ID:', response.id);

request.description: Create a new appointment with intelligent validation. The system checks specific date schedules first, then falls back to recurring schedules. Prevents double booking and validates doctor availability.
Get detailed information about a specific appointment including patient, doctor, and status information.
Update appointment status and add notes. Available statuses: pending, confirmed, cancelled, completed, no-show.
